name: chamana-fase2-scripts
description: Migration scripts for CHAMANA Phase 2 (2NF) database implementation

scripts.migrate: node 01_crear_database.js && node 02_crear_tablas.js && node 03_crear_indices.js && node 04_migrar_datos_fase1.js && node 05_inicializar_telas_temporadas.js && node 06_generar_pedidos_prueba.js
scripts.all: npm run migrate && npm run verify

author: Gabriel Osemberg
